params.description: params holds all the parameters of this module.

QueryParamsResponse.title: Query Params Response
QueryParamsResponse.description: QueryParamsResponse is response type for the Query/Params RPC method.

unbonding_time.description: unbonding_time is the time duration of unbonding.

max_validators.description: max_validators is the maximum number of validators.

max_entries.description: max_entries is the max entries for either unbonding delegation or redelegation (per pair/trio).

historical_entries.description: historical_entries is the number of historical entries to persist.

bond_denom.description: bond_denom defines the bondable coin denomination.

min_commission_rate.description: min_commission_rate is the chain-wide minimum commission rate that a validator can charge their delegators

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.Params.title: Params
cosmos.staking.v1beta1.Params.description: Params defines the parameters for the x/staking module.
